00144 /* Return true and issue an error message if the port is already bound to an interface during the 
00145    binding of other_if (called by bind(sc_export))
00146 */
00147 template<typename IF>
00148 bool tlm_target_port<IF>::is_already_bound(sc_interface * other_if) {
00149   if (dynamic_cast<sc_interface * >(this->get_interface()) == NULL) return(false);
00150   else {
00151     std::string if_name1,if_name2 ;
00152     sc_object * tmp = dynamic_cast<sc_object * >(other_if);
00153     if (tmp) if_name1 = tmp->name();
00154     else if_name1 = "unnamed interface (non sc_object)";
00155     tmp = dynamic_cast<sc_object * >(this->get_interface());
00156     if (tmp) if_name2 = tmp->name();
00157     else if_name2 = "unnamed interface (non sc_object)";
00158 
00159     std::string msg(sc_object::name());
00160     msg += (std::string)(": tlm_target_port warning, Can't bind to \"") + if_name1;
00161     msg += (std::string)("\" interface,the target port is already bound to this interface: \"");
00162     msg += if_name2 + (std::string)("\"\n");
00163     SC_REPORT_WARNING("binding warning",msg.c_str());
00164 
00165     return(true);
00166   }
00167 }
00168 
00169 //---------------------------
00170 // sc_export overridden methods
00171 //---------------------------
00172   
00173 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 // before_end_of_elaboration()
00175 // Called just before end of elaboration to propagate the significant target port id 
00176 // The only significant target port id is the one set by the module which implements the 
00177 // tlm core interface
00178 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 template<typename IF>
00180 void 
00181 tlm_target_port<IF>::before_end_of_elaboration()
00182 {
00183   // if this target port is not directly connected to the core interface
00184   if (get_target_port_list().size() > 1) {
00185 
00186     for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = get_target_port_list().begin();
00187         target_port != get_target_port_list().end();
00188         target_port++) {                          
00189       set_tlm_export_id((*target_port)->get_tlm_export_id());   // Propagate the target port id
00190     }
00191   }
00192 }
00193 
00194 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00195 // end_of_elaboration(). Debug message concerning target port list centent
00196 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 template<typename IF>
00198 void 
00199 tlm_target_port<IF>::end_of_elaboration() {
00200 
00201 #ifdef TLM_PORT_DEBUG
00202   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: Registered target port list :\n",sc_object::name());
00203   for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator port = get_target_port_list().begin();
00204       port != get_target_port_list().end();
00205       port++) {
00206     printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: \t- %s\n",sc_object::name(),(static_cast<target_port_type * >(*port))->name());      
00207   }
00208   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: -------------------------------------------------------\n",sc_object::name());
00209 #endif
00210     
00211 }
00212 //---------------------------------------------------------
00213 // Special binding between two target ports 
00214 //---------------------------------------------------------
00215 
00216 // bind(sc_export)
00217 template<typename IF>
00218 void 
00219 tlm_target_port<IF>::bind(target_port_type& target_port_)
00220 {
00221   // If the target port is still not bound
00222   if (!is_already_bound(target_port_.get_interface())) {
00223     // Copy the list of registered target ports to the current bound port (port propagation)
00224     for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = target_port_.get_target_port_list().begin();
00225         target_port != target_port_.get_target_port_list().end();
00226         target_port++) {
00227       this->register_target_port(*target_port);
00228     }
00229       
00230     // Calls sc_export standard bind method
00231     sc_export<interface_type>::bind(target_port_);
00232   }
00233 }
00234 
00235 // Specific case: if the bound export is based on a different interface. Requirement, the interface of 
00236 // the bound export MUST derive from the interface the export is based on.
00237 template<typename IF>
00238 template<typename OTHER_IF>
00239 void 
00240 tlm_target_port<IF>::bind(tlm_target_port<OTHER_IF>& target_port_) {
00241   // Test if OTHER_IF derives from IF
00242   IF * other_if = dynamic_cast<IF*>(target_port_.get_interface());
00243   if (other_if) {
00244     // If the target port is still not bound
00245     if (!is_already_bound(target_port_.get_interface())) {
00246       // Copy the list of registered target ports to the current bound port (port propagation)
00247       for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = target_port_.get_target_port_list().begin();
00248           target_port != target_port_.get_target_port_list().end();
00249           target_port++) { 
00250         this->register_target_port(*target_port);
00251       }
00252         
00253       // Calls sc_export standard bind method 
00254       sc_export<interface_type>::bind(*other_if);
00255     }
00256   }
00257   else {
00258     std::string msg(sc_object::name());
00259     msg += (std::string)(": tlm_target_port error, incompatible interface detected during the binding tlm_target_port  \"") + (std::string)(this->name());
00260     msg += (std::string)" to tlm_target_port \"" + (std::string)(target_port_.name()) +(std::string)("\"\n") ;
00261     SC_REPORT_ERROR("bind export to export failed",msg.c_str());
00262   }
00263 
00264 }

00267 //---------------------------------------------------------
00268 // Normal binding between port and interface.
00269 // To be redefined here (bind(port_) is overridden above
00270 //---------------------------------------------------------
00271   
00272 // bind(interface_type) 
00273 template<typename IF>
00274 void 
00275 tlm_target_port<IF>::bind(interface_type& interface_) {
00276   // Calls sc_export standard bind method
00277   sc_export<interface_type>::bind(interface_);
00278 }
00279   
00280 // operator() (interface_type): just calls bind(interface_type)
00281 template<typename IF>
00282 void 
00283 tlm_target_port<IF>::operator() (interface_type& interface_) {
00284   sc_export<interface_type>::bind(interface_); 
00285 }
